description: Captures natural language text from user messages for later English review.

hooks.prompt:
OUTPUT ONLY JSON. No explanation. No reasoning. No commentary.

Look at the user's message. Extract English natural language sentences. Ignore code, file paths, URLs, commands.

If short (1-3 words) or only code, output:
{"ok":true,"hookSpecificOutput":{"hookEventName":"UserPromptSubmit","additionalContext":"NO_TEXT"}}

Otherwise output:
{"ok":true,"hookSpecificOutput":{"hookEventName":"UserPromptSubmit","additionalContext":"ENGLISH_TEXT_CAPTURED\n[paste the English text here]"}}

NEVER set ok to false. NEVER output anything except one of these two JSON objects.
